issue.title: Ignition simulator lags behind rostopic outputs

content.raw: I have been running the simulation for 12 mins real time and I can't reproduce a 30s delay. But we've seen this before, the performance getting updates to the GUI is lower than getting data across the ROS bridge. We've been pushing some performance updates that should help with that, but I think you're already up-to-date with all the latest stuff.
content.html: I have been running the simulation for 12 mins real time and I can't reproduce a 30s delay.
